Room.Name: Main Street/Nathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: This is the intersection of Main Street and Nathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Main Street has most of the commerical and entertainment places located on it. It continues to the north, running to the village wall on the other side of Town Square. A lot of the entertainment in Browhaven tends to be rather bloody, since the culture is not up to that of Kista or Oceancrest.
